name: EZFPS
description: EZFPS is designed to make a simple FPS Deathmatch style game, with Ai bots, zombies, player classes, weapon loadouts, and attachments. As the player gets kills, they receive XP points and rank up, allowing them to unlock new weapons. 4 maps, a zombie mode, 8 weapons, and 3 classes, but an infinite amount of maps, weapons.
